Person.Name: Graham Bones
Person.Quote: You know you’re in love when you can’t fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams

Person.Name: Allyson Smith
Person.Quote: Get busy living or get busy dying

Person.Name: Murray Jacobs
Person.Quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself

Person.Name: Jill Edwards
Person.Quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us

Person.Name: Joseph Hoolahan
Person.Quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do
